name: koha-plugin-rbkc-oracle
description: A Koha plugin to manage finance integration with Oracle for RBKC

scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: bump version' && VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main --follow-tags
